TopicTitle: Oh Hello, didn't see you there!

Articles.Content:
Hey Guys,

I'm super pumped to have found a game that's a stack of fun without requiring me to kill anyone (not to say my kerbalnauts don't do their fair share of dying).

Anyone every played Spore? it reminds of that quite a bit. Quick Question: where is the section that lets me upload an avatar image on the forum? I couldn't find it under settings

Go in Setting at the top. At the left there a link Edit your Avatar. This should do the trick.

And Welcome to the forums!

Think there might still be the rule of having to make 5 posts before you can edit your profile with a picture and have a signature but not 100% sure.

Welcome to the forums anyway.

have fun.

G.

EDIT- also the off topic forum part doesn't count towards your 5 posts.

This is exactly why I enjoy this game so much! Welcome to the forums!

Welcome to the forums!

KSP is definitely a nice change of pace from all the shooters and wargames out there.

If you ever get stuck with any aspect of the game, feel free to check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig) or ask questions in the How To section of the forums. There are lots of friendly and knowledgeable people who might have gotten themselves out of the same situation before.

Happy landings!
